t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Oof... I hope this incident doesn't get leaked in the Daily Bunbunmaru.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Once it does, you will be contacted by the fashion industry.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: They would no doubt create a "Little Hair Queen" club.

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Little Hair Queen? Gee, it would have to be run by a phantom or something.

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: So, looks like it didn't start here. Where do you think it may have begun?

t_scene_info.speaker: Kiyomi:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Probably in a tower situated near the Youkai Mountain range...

t_scene_info.speaker: Marisa:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I won't let anyone challenge the hair of the sweet holy Queen of the Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo.
